text:
How to prompt ChatGPT for a book quote image.

Copy-paste this prompt below:

Prompt: "Create image remake this photo taken from a book, with the same low-quality, yellow highlighted text, and film-grain from a book. But change the quote for this: “YOUR QUOTE"

Here's an example:

Prompt: "Create image remake this photo taken from a book, with the same low-quality, yellow highlighted text, and film-grain from a book. But change the quote for this: “The fundamental delusion — there is something out there that will make me happy and fulfilled forever.” Naval"
